trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract base class from which all dynamic update notifications of changes to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> must be derived.
trans-unit.target: 表示抽象基底類別，所有對 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 完成的動態更新告知都必須從這個類別衍生。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used by a tracking service to determine that a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> has been dynamically updated.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤服務會使用這個類別判斷 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> 已動態更新。

trans-unit.source: The derived classes indicate which <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> is being dynamically updated, and what operation is being performed (added to the workflow, removed from the workflow, or changed).
trans-unit.target: 衍生類別指示正在動態更新的 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>，和正在執行的作業 (加入至工作流程，自工作流程移除，或變更)。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSetChangeAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSetChangeAction" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別覆寫時，取得要變更的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> to be changed.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> changes are occurring in.
When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會驗證 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 已正確設定，而且沒有任何錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The collection of the validation errors.
